modName: Larger clumps of grass and more varied V740T
summary: Larger clumps of grass and more suited to the kind of climate ...
descriptionHtml:
Hi All ;)

All modyfitacje grass is always only improved saturation clumps and nothing more.
I decided to change to your own needs - and now I share with you my work;)

What\'s New ...

- Any patch of grass has been remodeled (added new ears)
- Any patch of grass was different colorized.
- clumps of grass got a lot more flowers (czeso in different colors)
- Grass better now responds to lighting (dawn, day and dusk)
- Add a new blight caused fill clumps (visually more grass)

screens show the difference! (Screens taken at a resolution of 1360x768)
So the game looks like it even better :)
OLD = the original texture of the game;)

The modification should not significantly borne by the computer.
Modification compatible with all modifications landscape - with the exception of those that change the texture of grass.

If you like my work, please vote.

MY OTHER MODS

NEW texture for skill interface ------------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27980
textures for caver ---------------------------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25768
Recolor for mountains and rocks ----------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27999
NEW era for PLANTS -------------------------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28212

RECOMENDED MODS -- lush grass ----------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2171250
author: vito740
